channel.title: Personal Projects on Savo's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Personal Projects on Savo's Site

item.title: This Website
item.description: I made this website from scratch, would you like to peer behind the curtain?

item.title: Hardware Clock
item.description: A modular clock composed entirely out of discrete logic chips I got secondhand.

item.title: Battery Pack Cell Replacement
item.description: Replaced the cells in some old battery packs for my friends

item.title: Bus Stop Checker
item.description: Made a small system to check online for buses around my home at the press of a button.

item.title: Ornaments
item.description: Made some festive blinking lights to hand out. Used the 555 timer!

item.title: gameBOI
item.description: A small handheld capable of offering several user selectable games to be played using the two buttons and 32 LEDs that form a display. Created in under two weeks!

item.title: Entry Fob Replication
item.description: Reverse engineered and replicated an access fob for my residence at the time
